headline: Cohen & Steers Announces Changes to Realty Indexes
summary: Cohen & Steers, Inc. (NYSE: CNS) announced today pending changes to its Realty Majors Portfolio Index (RMP) and Global Realty Majors Portfolio Index (GRM), effective as of the close of business on August 15, 2025.

raw.headline: Cohen & Steers Announces Changes to Realty Indexes
raw.summary: Cohen & Steers, Inc. (NYSE: CNS) announced today pending changes to its Realty Majors Portfolio Index (RMP) and Global Realty Majors Portfolio Index (GRM), effective as of the close of business on August 15, 2025.
